name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;OldMan1;...So our little Lute is finally leaving, huh?
speak;Eirika;Yes, she seems to want to go with Artur on our journey.|Her knowledge should hopefully be an asset to us.
speak;OldMan1;Of course she will be!|She is a genius after all!|She was raised in the village of the most magically gifted in all Magvel!
speak;Eirika;I see...|Well we look forward to her efforts...
speak;OldMan1;Good!|As the most gifted old man in this village, I can't recommend her enough!|She will save Magvel in her sleep!
speak;Eirika;...Ok?|Well, thank you and I will excuse myself now...
speak;OldMan1;Go Lute!|Show the world your knowledge!|You are the smartest!!!
